q: Barbara Walters says she spent most of the time after the initial diagnosis trying to deny she needed the surgery. Perhaps, she says, she was hoping doctors would find a new, less invasive process. I had heard some horrendous things about it. Andy Coulson has always claimed he knew nothing about the hacking but last week he quit as David Cameron 's communications chief, saying when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on. Even with the number of suspects and alleged victims growing, many doubt the scandal will change Britain's keenly competitive tabloid culture.
